# Spellbreaker
## Overview
*Spellbreaker*: When raging, the barbarian gains Spellbreaker as a bonus feat. A barbarian must have the [[Disruptive|disruptive]] rage power and be at least 12th level to select this rage power.

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 76
